item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello There This is the first post I believe, and will serve as a a Readme in how to setup a hugo post. meta right. Writing a new post It’s pretty simple to start a new blog post. From your root folder (not sure that this is actually necessary) enter: hugo new post/my-post.md On the Hugo tutorial site it replaces post with posts above. A bit sloppy from the theme if you ask me.
